title: Hey guys, its not what you think :x
body:
My younger brother started streaming very recently. I'd like to say i am a good  big brother and want to promote his channel... but I'd rather just put this here in the hopes that you guys could spam somethin in his chat. He is a Singed OTP in plat... poor guy has like 2-3 viewers ;_;

https://www.twitch.tv/toxicsingedna

anyway there is the link, do your best to hit him with a DANK copy pasta. you can stay and watch or not, idc, I'd just like to see him get some whacky ass twitch feed :3

also this clown is buyin mejais on singed

comrade spam OP
